FeedbackDialog.description: Help us improve degni-kit! Your feedback is valuable to the community.

feedback.placeholder: Tell us what you think about degni-kit, what features you'd like, or report any issues...

rating.label: How would you rate your experience?

FeedbackDialog.title: Share Your Feedback

cta.subtitle: Join the community of developers building amazing applications with degni-kit.
cta.title: Ready to build something amazing?

auth.description: Complete authentication with Better Auth: OAuth, 2FA, sessions, and email verification out of the box.
auth.title: Production-Ready Auth

design.description: Beautiful UI with shadcn/ui, dark mode, smooth animations, and fully customizable components.
design.title: Modern Design System

i18n.description: Multi-language support with next-intl. Easily reach a global audience with built-in i18n.
i18n.title: Full Internationalization

performance.description: Next.js 16 with App Router, React Server Components, and optimized for speed and SEO.
performance.title: Blazing Fast Performance

features.subtitle: Everything you need to launch your SaaS, side project, or MVP in days, not weeks.
features.title: Ship faster with degni-kit

hero.subtitle: The ultimate Next.js 16 starter kit with authentication, i18n, and beautiful UI. Save weeks of development time and focus on what matters.
hero.title: Ship Your Next.js SaaS Faster

success.revokedAll: You have been signed out of all devices.
